llm_res: NO. The interface of the contract BTether does not contain the function `symbol() public view returns (string)`.

YES

The function `balanceOf` in the provided code violates the ERC-20 rule that requires it to return "the account balance of the account with address _owner". Instead of returning the exact balance, the function modifies the balance by adding a constant value of 524 to the result of `tokenFromReflection(_rOwned[account])`. This alteration does not comply with the standard ERC-20 implementation, where the balance should reflect the actual and precise number of tokens held by an address without any modification or adjustment.
